parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Environment </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Changes the waves value smoothly during the given time (in seconds). A time of zero means there will be an immediate change.<br><br>
'''NOTE''': This command will have no effect (even though the value of [[waves]] changes) unless <tt>Manual Override</tt> option is selected in the editor in the Intel, which is normally off.<br><br>
[[Image:setWaves.jpg|left|600px]]  </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> time '''setWaves''' value </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> time: [[Number]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> value: [[Number]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>180 [[setWaves]] .5;</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>0 [[setWaves]] 1;
</code></value></part><part><name/>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[waves]], [[fog]], [[overcast]], [[setLightnings]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part></template>
